name: Debugger
body:
Djtec/Debugger
============

PHP Debugger 1.0.0

![debugger](http://djtec.github.com/Debugger/img/demo.png)

Requirement
-----------
PHP 5.3.0

Usage
-----------
```php
use Djtec/Debugger;
echo Debugger::run($var);
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
